abstract: Work at Saab’s main pant in Sweden is halted as the company tries to resolve pay and contract disputes with its suppliers.
snippet: Work at Saab’s main pant in Sweden is halted as the company tries to resolve pay and contract disputes with its suppliers.
lead_paragraph: Little more than a year after General Motors engineered a sale that saved Saab from oblivion, the carmaker is facing a fresh bout of financial troubles that threaten to spread pain across Sweden.

headline.main: A Year After G.M. Unloaded It, Saab Is in Trouble Again
headline.print_headline: Saab Suffers New Round Of Financial Difficulties
